name: Ninja Samurai Assassin Hero 5 Blade of Fire
name_original: Ninja Samurai Assassin Hero 5 Blade of Fire
description:
In this violent 3D action game you play as angry ninja samurai. You have been hired to complete task from ex general of a empire to save the land. To get him it is not going to be easy. There are awaiting for you many traps, obstacles and enemies on the way. This epic fun game contains 30 levels. Aim to collect all stars and climb where is the target showing on your compas to finish a mission. Your main mission is to go after murder of the real king of a kingdom. By your journey you will deal with his army.

Collect magic arrows to make your mission easier to eliminate anything in your way.
Unaware from your mercenary enemies you can finish the level like a japanese rising invisible hunter without of need to gear up and crime combat.

Finish all levels, defeat all your enemies and become a legend. You can also pick stealth approach and use your infiltration, sneak, spy skills. Swim,climb and discover secret entrances to a castles. Use underground tunnels,climb on a bridge and try to be invisible as a real ninja warrior of shadow. Climb to top of the towers in a castles and jump down to water or hay mound to finish your fight with ease.

Feel sense of archery and strike at the right moment. Develop this skill as a player and shoot a magic arrow through more than 2 enemies at once. You are armed with lethal sword blade ( katana ) and bow.

You can buy them in the shop for gold you can find behind secret enters. With super equipment your hero can reach almost immortality. Sneak and wait for good opportunity to hit in right moment. Mortal warriors will try to crush you with their strong tiger armor and hammer. Every enemy has different abilities. Your hero has through learning of kung fu, martial arts, fighting skills, climbing from your evil sensei.

You will have to chop, kick, punch, slash through them like a hero or just climb away to disappear. Don't get hit if you know how to move in shadows. Be man and stand against traitor and his army who murdered your king. Use iron and gold swords, axes, hammers or bone bow to clear your way.

- wonderful background music
- realistic HD graphics
- Realistic stealth and combat movements
- bloody action
- around 200 different weapons
-open world
